networkplugin.name: HUNT Mobile Ads
networkplugin.info_content:
Network Info

HUNT is the first mobile advertising network targeted to Spanish-speaking market, including all of Latin American and the U.S. Hispanic market, and offers solutions to discover, build brands and capitalize on the mobile Internet sector.

Ad Formats

HUNT supports both Banner Ads, Text Ads and Rich Media Ads.

Best Countries

All Spanish Speaking Countries, Latin America and U.S. Hispanic
